General.Name: Cambuci S.A
General.Description: Cambuci S.A. manufactures football items in Brazil. It sells its products through stores and e-commerce to direct customers and retailers. The company was founded in 1945 and is based in Sao Roque, Brazil.
General.Address: Av. Getúlio Vargas, 930, São Roque, SP, Brazil, 18130-430

2.Name: Emerson Tsuneji Shiromaru
2.Title: Director of International Operations, Innovation & Technology
